subject: Re: Order #SSN4012, how did it go?

conversations.body_text: Hi David H,  The current status of the package is Sydney, NSW, AU, Your express has been delivered on 2025-12-19. Didn't you get it?

Havent set it up yet

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi David H,    I'm sorry to hear that. Please check your front door or yard and ask your family and neighbors. Thank you for your cooperation.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047100351579,SF6047100351603         Merry Christmas!
